headline: CMG Announces the Appointment of Christopher Wright to the Board of Directors
summary: CALGARY, Alberta, Feb. 10, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Computer Modelling Group Ltd. (“CMG” or the “Company”) (TSX: CMG) is pleased to announce the appointment of Christopher Wright to its Board of Directors, effective today. Mr. Wright brings extensive experience in global investment, board governance, and growth strategy. Mr. Wright served on the Board of Roper Technologies (NYSE: ROP, S&P 500, Sarasota FL), a market leading vertical software and technology business, for thirty-five years. During
